sys_update_xml.name: sys_script_597be85adbdd6b0050479eb6db961982
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="sys_script"><sys_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><abort_action>false</abort_action><access>package_private</access><action_delete>false</action_delete><action_insert>false</action_insert><action_query>false</action_query><action_update>true</action_update><active>true</active><add_message>false</add_message><advanced>true</advanced><change_fields>false</change_fields><client_callable>false</client_callable><collection>sc_req_item</collection><condition/><description>
This Business rule is to trigger system email notification when a request is created(Opened), closed complete and closed incomple. </description><execute_function>false</execute_function><filter_condition table="sc_req_item">stateCHANGESTO3^ORstateCHANGESTO4^cat_item.sc_catalogsLIKEbfbcbddcdb686740fe199236db9619d8^EQ<item endquery="false" field="state" goto="false" newquery="false" operator="CHANGESTO" or="false" value="3"/><item endquery="false" field="state" goto="false" newquery="false" operator="CHANGESTO" or="true" value="4"/><item endquery="false" field="cat_item.sc_catalogs" goto="false" newquery="false" operator="LIKE" or="false" value="bfbcbddcdb686740fe199236db9619d8"/><item endquery="true" field="" goto="false" newquery="false" operator="=" or="false" value=""/></filter_condition><is_rest>false</is_rest><message/><name>OCIO SR SC_request.closed.notify</name><order>100</order><priority>100</priority><rest_method/><rest_method_text/><rest_service/><rest_service_text/><rest_variables/><role_conditions/><script><![CDATA[(function executeRule(current, previous /*null when async*/) {

		if((current.u_item_notify_requested_for == true)){
			gs.eventQueue("SC_request.closed.notify_CSC", current, current.u_item_requested_for, current.u_item_requested_for.first_name);}
			
		if((current.u_item_notify_requested_by == true) && (current.u_item_requested_by != current.u_item_requested_for)){
			gs.eventQueue("SC_request.closed.notify_CSC", current, current.u_item_requested_by, current.u_item_requested_by.first_name);	
	
}

})(current, previous);]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>MKURIAKO</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2018-10-24 00:50:50</sys_created_on><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path><sys_id>597be85adbdd6b0050479eb6db961982</sys_id><sys_mod_count>4</sys_mod_count><sys_name>OCIO SR SC_request.closed.notify</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="Global" source="global">global</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_597be85adbdd6b0050479eb6db961982</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>MKURIAKO</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2018-10-24 16:14:27</sys_updated_on><template/><when>after</when></sys_script><sys_translated_text action="delete_multiple" query="documentkey=597be85adbdd6b0050479eb6db961982"/></record_update>

Close notes: ${close_notes}

sys_update_xml.name: sys_script_1a6a706edb00230066d65608689619f7
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="sys_script"><sys_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><abort_action>false</abort_action><access>package_private</access><action_delete>false</action_delete><action_insert>false</action_insert><action_query>false</action_query><action_update>true</action_update><active>true</active><add_message>false</add_message><advanced>true</advanced><change_fields>false</change_fields><client_callable>false</client_callable><collection>sc_req_item</collection><condition/><description/><execute_function>false</execute_function><filter_condition table="sc_req_item">commentsVALCHANGES^ORwork_notesVALCHANGES^EQ<item endquery="false" field="comments" goto="false" newquery="false" operator="VALCHANGES" or="false" value=""/><item endquery="false" field="work_notes" goto="false" newquery="false" operator="VALCHANGES" or="true" value=""/><item endquery="true" field="" goto="false" newquery="false" operator="=" or="false" value=""/></filter_condition><is_rest>false</is_rest><message/><name>SC_task_notification</name><order>100</order><priority>100</priority><rest_method/><rest_method_text/><rest_service/><rest_service_text/><rest_variables/><role_conditions/><script><![CDATA[(function executeRule(current, previous /*null when async*/) {
var updated_by=current.sys_updated_by;

var cat_item = new GlideRecord('sc_task');
cat_item.addQuery('request_item',current.sys_id);
cat_item.query();
while(cat_item.next())
    
    {
        
var parm1='';
var parm2=current.sys_updated_on.getDisplayValue();
if(cat_item.assigned_to.user_name !=updated_by){

gs.eventQueue("SC-task_notification_assignee", cat_item, parm1, parm2);
}
    }

})(current, previous);
]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>NKUMAR</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2018-08-23 17:17:33</sys_created_on><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path><sys_id>1a6a706edb00230066d65608689619f7</sys_id><sys_mod_count>9</sys_mod_count><sys_name>SC_task_notification</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="Global" source="global">global</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_1a6a706edb00230066d65608689619f7</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>MKURIAKO</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2018-10-24 20:16:23</sys_updated_on><template/><when>before</when></sys_script><sys_translated_text action="delete_multiple" query="documentkey=1a6a706edb00230066d65608689619f7"/></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: sys_script_b75e9131db5d2b0050479eb6db961981
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="sys_script"><sys_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><abort_action>false</abort_action><access>package_private</access><action_delete>false</action_delete><action_insert>false</action_insert><action_query>false</action_query><action_update>true</action_update><active>false</active><add_message>false</add_message><advanced>true</advanced><change_fields>false</change_fields><client_callable>false</client_callable><collection>sc_req_item</collection><condition/><description> Change to BCGOV-SR-NOTIF03 SR UPDATED. To fire Notif03 when changes are made to either the request, the RITM or the Task and the changes are made by someone other than the task Assigned to person. Changes include modifying the following fields: Work notes, Additional comments, Attachments, or a new call record being linked to an existing Request.</description><execute_function>false</execute_function><filter_condition table="sc_req_item">work_notesVALCHANGES^ORcommentsVALCHANGES^cat_item.sc_catalogsLIKEbfbcbddcdb686740fe199236db9619d8^EQ<item endquery="false" field="work_notes" goto="false" newquery="false" operator="VALCHANGES" or="false" value=""/><item endquery="false" field="comments" goto="false" newquery="false" operator="VALCHANGES" or="true" value=""/><item endquery="false" field="cat_item.sc_catalogs" goto="false" newquery="false" operator="LIKE" or="false" value="bfbcbddcdb686740fe199236db9619d8"/><item endquery="true" field="" goto="false" newquery="false" operator="=" or="false" value=""/></filter_condition><is_rest>false</is_rest><message/><name>OCIO SC_task_P6_notification</name><order>100</order><priority>100</priority><rest_method/><rest_method_text/><rest_service/><rest_service_text/><rest_variables/><role_conditions/><script><![CDATA[(function executeRule(current, previous /*null when async*/) {

var updated_by=current.sys_updated_by;
var cat_item = new GlideRecord('sc_task');
cat_item.addQuery('request_item',current.sys_id);
cat_item.query();
while(cat_item.next())
    
    {
        
var parm1='';
var parm2='';
		
if(cat_item.assigned_to.user_name !=updated_by){
gs.eventQueue("SC_request_Notification_P6", cat_item, parm1, parm2);
}
    }

})(current, previous);
]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>NKUMAR</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2018-10-22 15:25:55</sys_created_on><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path><sys_id>b75e9131db5d2b0050479eb6db961981</sys_id><sys_mod_count>8</sys_mod_count><sys_name>OCIO SC_task_P6_notification</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="Global" source="global">global</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_b75e9131db5d2b0050479eb6db961981</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>MKURIAKO</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2018-10-23 22:23:48</sys_updated_on><template/><when>before</when></sys_script><sys_translated_text action="delete_multiple" query="documentkey=b75e9131db5d2b0050479eb6db961981"/></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: sys_script_aa64c6a4db116700fe199236db961948
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="sys_script"><sys_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><abort_action>false</abort_action><access>package_private</access><action_delete>false</action_delete><action_insert>true</action_insert><action_query>false</action_query><action_update>false</action_update><active>true</active><add_message>false</add_message><advanced>true</advanced><change_fields>false</change_fields><client_callable>false</client_callable><collection>sc_req_item</collection><condition/><description>
This Business rule is to trigger system email notification when a request is created(Opened), closed complete and closed incomple. </description><execute_function>false</execute_function><filter_condition table="sc_req_item">cat_item.sc_catalogsLIKEbfbcbddcdb686740fe199236db9619d8^EQ<item endquery="false" field="cat_item.sc_catalogs" goto="false" newquery="false" operator="LIKE" or="false" value="bfbcbddcdb686740fe199236db9619d8"/><item endquery="true" field="" goto="false" newquery="false" operator="=" or="false" value=""/></filter_condition><is_rest>false</is_rest><message/><name>OCIO SR SC_request.inserted.notify</name><order>100</order><priority>100</priority><rest_method/><rest_method_text/><rest_service/><rest_service_text/><rest_variables/><role_conditions/><script><![CDATA[(function executeRule(current, previous /*null when async*/) {
	
	
if((current.variables.u_notify_req_for == "true")){
	
			
gs.eventQueue("SC_request.inserted.notify_CSC", current, current.variables.u_requested_for, current.variables.u_requested_for.first_name);
		}
			
if((current.variables.u_notify_me == "true") && (current.variables.u_requested_for != current.variables.u_requested_by)){
	
gs.eventQueue("SC_request.inserted.notify_CSC", current, current.variables.u_requested_by, current.variables.u_requested_by.first_name);	
	
}

})(current, previous);]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>NKUMAR</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2018-10-18 20:50:59</sys_created_on><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path><sys_id>aa64c6a4db116700fe199236db961948</sys_id><sys_mod_count>22</sys_mod_count><sys_name>OCIO SR SC_request.inserted.notify</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="Global" source="global">global</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_aa64c6a4db116700fe199236db961948</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>MKURIAKO</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2018-10-24 16:37:55</sys_updated_on><template/><when>after</when></sys_script><sys_translated_text action="delete_multiple" query="documentkey=aa64c6a4db116700fe199236db961948"/></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: sys_script_01175810eb100100fcfb858ad106fee3
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="sys_script"><sys_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><abort_action>false</abort_action><access/><action_delete>false</action_delete><action_insert>true</action_insert><action_query>false</action_query><action_update>true</action_update><active>true</active><add_message>false</add_message><advanced>true</advanced><change_fields>false</change_fields><client_callable>false</client_callable><collection>new_call</collection><condition>current.call_type.changesTo('sc_request') && current.transferred_to.nil()</condition><description/><execute_function>false</execute_function><filter_condition/><is_rest>false</is_rest><message/><name>CallTypeChanged to Request</name><order>200</order><priority>100</priority><rest_method/><rest_method_text/><rest_service/><rest_service_text/><rest_variables/><role_conditions/><script><![CDATA[var reqFor = current.u_requested_for;
var contactType = current.contact_type;
var location = current.caller.location;
var reqItem = current.request_item;
var comments = "NEW_CALL_REF:" + current.sys_id + " ";//+ current.description;
var call_record=current.sys_id;
getCart();

var url = "com.glideapp.servicecatalog_cat_item_view.do?sysparm_id=" + reqItem 
	+ "&sysparm_requested_for=" + GlideStringUtil.urlEncode(reqFor) 
	+ "&sysparm_location=" + GlideStringUtil.urlEncode(location) 
	+ "&sysparm_special_instructions=" + GlideStringUtil.urlEncode(comments)
	+ "&sysparm_stack=" + current.getLink()
	+ "&sysparm_contact_type=" + contactType
    + "&sysparm_call_record=" + call_record;
action.setRedirectURL(url);

function getCart() {
	var cart = new GlideRecord('sc_cart');
	var userid = gs.getUserID();
	cart.addQuery('user', userid);
	cart.query();
	if (cart.next()) {
		// We already have a cart so override the requested for value and empty it
		cart.requested_for = reqFor;
		cart.contact_type = contactType;
		cart.special_instructions = comments;
		cart.delivery_address = getDeliveryAddress();
		cart.update();
		var cartItems = new GlideRecord('sc_cart_item');
		cartItems.addQuery('cart', cart.sys_id);
		cartItems.deleteMultiple();
	} else {
		cart.initialize();
		cart.user = userid;
		cart.requested_for = reqFor;
		cart.contact_type = contactType;
		cart.special_instructions = comments;
		cart.delivery_address = getDeliveryAddress();
		cart.insert();
		
	}
	return cart;
}

function getDeliveryAddress() {
	var gr = new GlideRecord('cmn_location');
	if (!gr.get(location))
		return '';
	
	var text = '';
	if (!gr.street.nil())
		text = gr.street + '\n';
	if (!gr.city.nil() && !gr.state.nil() && !gr.zip.nil())
		text += gr.city + ", " + gr.state + ", " + gr.zip;
	return text;
}]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>sn.dev</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2013-03-19 15:25:54</sys_created_on><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path><sys_id>01175810eb100100fcfb858ad106fee3</sys_id><sys_mod_count>15</sys_mod_count><sys_name>CallTypeChanged to Request</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="Service Desk Call" source="com.snc.service_desk_call">a461e979db1913000f819274db96193e</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_01175810eb100100fcfb858ad106fee3</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>MKURIAKO</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2018-10-25 00:45:42</sys_updated_on><template/><when>after</when></sys_script><sys_translated_text action="delete_multiple" query="documentkey=01175810eb100100fcfb858ad106fee3"/></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: sys_script_c2b3e28adb596b0050479eb6db9619bf
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="sys_script"><sys_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><abort_action>false</abort_action><access>package_private</access><action_delete>false</action_delete><action_insert>false</action_insert><action_query>false</action_query><action_update>true</action_update><active>true</active><add_message>false</add_message><advanced>true</advanced><change_fields>false</change_fields><client_callable>false</client_callable><collection>sc_task</collection><condition/><description> Change to BCGOV-SR-NOTIF03 SR UPDATED. To fire Notif03 when changes are made to either the request, the RITM or the Task and the changes are made by someone other than the task Assigned to person. Changes include modifying the following fields: Work notes, Additional comments, Attachments, or a new call record being linked to an existing Request.</description><execute_function>false</execute_function><filter_condition table="sc_task">work_notesVALCHANGES^ORcommentsVALCHANGES^request_item.cat_item.sc_catalogsLIKEbfbcbddcdb686740fe199236db9619d8^EQ<item endquery="false" field="work_notes" goto="false" newquery="false" operator="VALCHANGES" or="false" value=""/><item endquery="false" field="comments" goto="false" newquery="false" operator="VALCHANGES" or="true" value=""/><item endquery="false" field="request_item.cat_item.sc_catalogs" goto="false" newquery="false" operator="LIKE" or="false" value="bfbcbddcdb686740fe199236db9619d8"/><item endquery="true" field="" goto="false" newquery="false" operator="=" or="false" value=""/></filter_condition><is_rest>false</is_rest><message/><name>OCIO SC_task_P6_notification</name><order>100</order><priority>100</priority><rest_method/><rest_method_text/><rest_service/><rest_service_text/><rest_variables/><role_conditions/><script><![CDATA[(function executeRule(current, previous /*null when async*/) {

var updated_by=current.sys_updated_by;

var parm1='Task record '+current.number+" updated";
var parm2=current.sys_updated_on.getDisplayValue();
if(current.assigned_to.user_name !=updated_by){

gs.eventQueue("SC-task_notification_assignee", current, parm1, parm2);
	
}
  

})(current, previous);
